title: I think this was made on purpose

author: [deleted]
text: I want Iran to win after the shit show between my country and the US

author: [deleted]
text: Why so spiteful lol

author: Specialist_Map_3822
text: Because of the shit show between his country and the US.

author: x3non_04
text: US declares "special military operation" after the match

author: my-time-has-odor
text: bro we only have like… 1 premier league player and y’all still lost to fucking Americans

author: redswan4
text: It was a draw

author: my-time-has-odor
text: To draw to Americans is to lose, let’s just be honest

author: TheWhiteCells
text: lol cause your team choked? nice

author: ChangingCrisis
text: Choked? Still top of the group. We were there for the taking and you guys could only muster up one chance all game. Honestly embarrassing to be honest, especially with how much you guys talk.

author: TheWhiteCells
text: embarrassing for us? lmao “its coming home” and you couldn’t beat your bitterest rival. have a nice day mate

author: Fast-Engineer915
text:
Whilst it’s probably not coming home. We did draw with Scotland in our middle group stage game and ultimately lose on penalties in the final of the Euros.

Scotland are bigger football rivals than the US.

After maybe Germany, Argentina and France.

Italy probably up there too.

USA does appear to be quite the bogey team for us though.

author: ChangingCrisis
text:
You must know nothing if you think you're our bitterest rival.

At least we're not going home.

author: my-time-has-odor
text: That proves our point. First soccer match most of these people have seen all year, Americans know nothing, but still draw with you

author: ChangingCrisis
text: So why treat it like a win? Nobody can take you guys seriously.

author: my-time-has-odor
text:
Uhhh yeah because you were supposed to beat us lmao… everybody said 4-0, 5-0, 3-0…

0-0 rip bozo. To draw means your team is equivalent to the other team. A country of **soccer** fantatics should not be on par with people who’d rather watch football. Or basketball. Or baseball. Or even hockey and then probably reality TV before they consider turning on a **soccer** game.

author: ChangingCrisis
text:
Look at you clinging on to a 0-0 draw like you did anything whilst you claim to be an Argentina fan. You're fucking embarrassing. Even American an would find you embarrassing. Look at the state of you.

You couldn't even beat a country 100 times smaller than yours.

LMFAO

author: GreenFuzyKiwi
text: American here, between the two of you… you, u/changingcrisis, are more cause for embarrassment than u/my-time-has-odor .. the point he’s making is very straightforward, england for sure should’ve slapped us around. Association football ain’t what it used to be though ig

author: [deleted]
text: [deleted]

author: TheWhiteCells
text: Suck on my tea bags

author: [deleted]
text:
Do people outside of England not realise that ”it’s coming home” is satire about how poorly England do? If you listen to the whole song it’s self deprecating.

Also, you aren’t even on our top 20 list of rivals, let along bitterest.

author: HisWife00000
text: "It's coming home" is intentional hopeful thinking.

author: pablitodk
text: Shitty game from England. US deserved a lot more.

author: ChangingCrisis
text: I wouldn't say "deserved" but you should have beaten us the way we played. You created 1 chance all game.

author: pablitodk
text: I'm not even supporting the US. I'm just being objective. English players are A LOT BETTER but US played more like a team. I think everyone expected more from England specially after beating Iran 6-2.

author: ChangingCrisis
text: Agreed. We played not to lose rather than to win. It worked but we are capable of so much more.

author: Data_Fan
text: Who's talking?

author: ChangingCrisis
text: Basically every American.

author: Data_Fan
text:
Umm...we call the game soccer and barely give a shit about it.

I couldn't watch the game at work because everyone in the common area favored Fox News...

author: my-time-has-odor
text: You’re goddamn right because we just beat you 0-0
